Adventure

Former Extended Wilderness Trip Leader for the Chewonki Foundation and Summit Intern at Mount Washington Observatory. My passion for outdoor adventure has taken me across diverse landscapes and challenging conditions.

Summit day on Mount Washington - perfect conditions for weather observations

Multi-pitch climbing in the White Mountains during summer expedition season

Winter camping and snow science work in the Presidential Range

Leading extended wilderness trips through Maine's pristine backcountry

Adventures from coast to mountains, teaching wilderness skills and environmental stewardship.
